sentences.en: For weeks the affair threatened to be a cesspit of scandal.
sentences.cn: 几个星期来，这一事件眼看就要成为丑闻的滋生源。

sentences.en: It was a kind of cesspit constantly seething with smallpox and bubonic plague.
sentences.cn: 那里,几乎可以说曾经是天花和黑死病生生不息的污水坑.

words.tran_cn: 垃圾坑，[环境]污水坑；粪坑

trans.tran_en: a large hole or container under the ground in which waste from a building, especially from the toilets, is collected
